video:video.video:description: Embedded Google Doc containing full list of touch-led research strategies, questions, and frameworks for artistic collaboration and inclusive education.

video:video.video:title: About Beyond Gaze – Touch-led Dramatic Inquiry
video:video.video:description: Touch is the first sense we get to experience in life. This research investigates touch as an artistic medium, proposing touch-led strategies and dramatic inquiry methods to enhance collaboration, learning, and inclusivity.

video:video.video:title: Contact Beyond Gaze
video:video.video:description: For suggestions of touch-led practices or comments, contact: info at beyondgaze dot work
